actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize the rehabilitation and expansion of The African American Panoramic Experience Center within the Martin Luther King, Junior, Historic Site and Preservation District.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to make grants to the Collections of Life and Heritage, Inc., a nonprofit corporation of the African-American Panoramic Experience Museum in Atlanta, Georgia, to rehabilitate and expand their present facility, subject to specified conditions. Expands the Martin Luther King Junior Historic Site and Preservation District. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To authorize the rehabilitation and expansion of The African American Panoramic Experience Center within the Martin Luther King, Junior, Historic Site and Preservation District.
